card.title: Marketing Website
card.description: Wild & Grey is a collective studio of designers and creatives passionate about storytelling, social good, and designing meaningful experiences.

header.title: Overview
text: What first started out as my passion project, Wild & Grey officially launched in 2016 and is now a studio collective of designers and artists from the US and Europe. We focus on client services such as video production, photography, and design, as well as internal projects under the Wild & Grey brand. The official site will be released in the summer of 2017.

We’ve worked with Airbnb, Mashable, Ugmonk, Jeremy Cowart, Dann Petty + Epicurrence, Sony, Reddit, Disney, and Target, Patagonia, Blood:Water, Intercom, Hallmark, 1Face Watch, Reach Records, SWISSGEAR, Pebble, Method and more.
